# Slimy Doom
## Overview
**Type:** disease, contact

**Save:** Fortitude DC 14

**Onset:** 1 day

**Frequency:** 1/day

**Effect:** 1d4 Con damage, target must make a second Fort save or 1 point of the damage is drain instead

**Cure:** 2 consecutive saves
